channel.title: Boise City|Cimarron County|Oklahoma|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Boise City|Cimarron County|Oklahoma|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-56/US-64/US-412 West Approaching US-385/OK-325
item.description: US-56/US-64/US-412 West approaching US-385/OK-325 approaching roundabout at the Cimarron County courthouse in Boise City.

item.title: US-56/US-64/US-412/OK-3 East Approaching US-287
item.description: US-56/US-64/US-412/OK-3 East approaching US-287 in Boise City.

item.title: US-56/US-64/US-412/OK-3 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-56/US-64/US-412/OK-3 East. Distance to Amarillo, TX and Oklahoma City.

item.title: US-56/US-64/US-412/OK-3/US-385 - South Exit of Boise City Roundabout
item.description: US-56/US-64/US-412/OK-3/US-385 - south exit of the Boise City roundabout. Turn right for US-56/US-64/US-412 West/US-385 South to Clayton, NM and Dalhart, TX. This sign is white as opposed to the usual green sign.

item.title: US-56/US-64/US-412/OK-3/US-385 at OK-325 - West Exit of Boise City Roundabout
item.description: US-56/US-64/US-412/OK-3/US-385 at OK-325 the west exit of the Boise City Roundabout. Turn right for OK-325 West to Kenton.

item.title: US-56/US-64/US-412/OK-3 East at US-385/OK-325
item.description: Roundabout diagram in front of the Cimarron County Courthouse in Boise City.

item.title: US-56/US-64/US-412/OK-3/US-385 - East Exit of Boise City Roundabout
item.description: US-56/US-64/US-412/OK-3/US-385 at east exit of Boise City roundabout. Turn right for US-56/US-64/US-412/OK-3 East to Guymon and Amarillo, Texas.

item.title: US-56/US-64/US-385/US-412 at OK-3/OK-325
item.description: US-56/US-64/US-385/US-412 approaching OK-3/OK-325 in Boise City.

item.title: US-56/US-64/US-412 East/US-385 North - Boise City
